verses.1: “Lunggulhna tawh nungak khatpeuh ka et ngei loh nading, kiciamna ka bawl khin hi.
verses.2: Vanglian Pasian in eite bang hong cih a, mihingteʼ gamtatna bangci thuhkik ahi hiam?
verses.3: A man loin a gamtate tungah siatna le gimna a tungsak hi.
verses.4: Pasian in ka gamtatna khempeuh thei a, ka kalsuanna khempeuh a hong mu hi.
verses.5: “Ka gitloh gamtat ngei lohna, kuamah ka khem ngei het lohna, ka gamtat hoihna thute ah ka kiciam ngam hi.
verses.6: Pasian in tawikhaina man ah hong tawikhai hen; ka paubaan het lohna hong mu ding hi.
verses.7: Lampi man panin ka pial a, siatna lam ka zuih a, ka khut tungah mawhna a baan taak leh
verses.8: ka khawh sa ante midangteʼ nek suak henla, ka an neih khempeuh maimang tahen.
verses.9: “Ka veengteʼ zi zawlmitin, a kong gei ah ngakin ka buk taak leh
verses.10: ka it ka zi in midangteʼ an suksak henla, midangteʼ ang ah lum tahen.
verses.11: (Tua bang mawhna pen a siahuai hi a, sihna a thuak ding ahi hi.
verses.12: Ka neih khempeuh a kaang tum thei mei husia tawh a kibang ahi hi.)
verses.13: “Ka nasemte khat peuhpeuh kei tungah hong phun ciangin, ama thu ngai-in limtakin ka bawl hi.
verses.14: Tua ci kei leng, Pasianʼ mai mu ngam ding ka hi hiam? Keima thu a khen dingin Pasian hong pai ciangin bang gen mawk ding ka hi hiam?
verses.15: Kei a hong piangsak Pasian mah in keima nasemte zong a piangsak ahi hi.
verses.16: “Mizawngte ka huh ding ka mangngilh ngei kei a, meigong numeite ka guaksuaksak ngei kei hi.
verses.17: Keimah in an ne napi-in, tagahte a gil kialin ka koihkhong ngei kei hi.
verses.18: Ka khang tawntungin tua bangte ka en tawntung hi.
verses.19: “Mi a cimawh, puan silh ding a lei zo lo, a zawng lua ka muh ciangin,
verses.20: ka tuu hon panin ka ngah tuumul puan kibawl ka pia hi. Amah in zong a lungsim neih khempeuh tawh kei a hong phat hi.
verses.21: “Zum thukhenna ah zo na ning cih ngaihsutna tawh tagah khatpeuh ka khem taak leh,
verses.22: ka khutte buisum henla, ka liang bul panin kilong khia tahen.
verses.23: Pasianʼ gimpiak ding kihta ka hih manin, tua bang peuhmah ka gamta ngei kei ding hi.
verses.24: “Leitung hauhna muan le suanin ka nei ngei kei a,
verses.25: ka hauhna zong ka kisaktheih pih ngei kei hi.
verses.26: A taang mahmah ni ahi a, a hoih mahmah kha ahi zongin, cikmahin ka bia ngei kei hi.
verses.27: Tuate pahtawina le zahtakna limin ka khut lapna tawh cikmah hunin ka khial ngei het kei hi.
verses.28: Tua bang mawhna in sihna a thuak ding hi a, tua bang mawhna pen Vanglian Pasian nialna ahi hi.
verses.29: “Ka galteʼn gim a thuak teh ka kipak ngei kei a, haksatna a tuah uh teh ka lungdam ngei kei hi.
verses.30: A sih ding uh deihna tawh ka samsia ngei kei hi.
verses.31: Zin le leengte limtakin ka do tawntungna thu ka na a hong sepsak mi khempeuh in a thei uh hi.
verses.32: Khualzin mi khempeuh ka inn ah ka tungsak tawntung a, kongzing lakah amaute ka lumsak ngei kei hi.
verses.33: Midangte in a mawhnate uh pulak loin imcip uh a, ahih hangin keima mawhna cikmahin ka im ngei kei hi.
verses.34: Midangteʼ hong kampau ding kihtakin ka nei ngei kei hi. Amauʼ hong simmawh ding ka kihtakna hangin pau loin ka omngei kei a, ka bucip ngei kei hi.
verses.35: “Ka thugente kuamah in na ngai lo ding ahi hiam? Ka gen thu khempeuh man hi, ci-in ka kiciam hi. Vanglian Pasian in kei hong dawng tahen. “Ka langte in kei hong mawhsakna thute ka tawi theih dingin lai sungah a kigelh hileh
verses.36: tua mawhsaknate kisialhna tawh ka ngawng ah ka ok dinga, mi khempeuh in a muh dingin ka sangsak ding hi.
verses.37: Ka gamtatna khempeuh Pasian kiangah ka gen dinga, ama muhna ah lungdamin kihihsakna tawh ka om ding hi.
verses.38: “Ka khawh leitang ka guk ahih a, a nei taktak paʼ tung pan ka suh ahih a,
verses.39: tua leitang a piang ante ka nek a, tua lo a khote a puksi-in ka omsak taak leh,
verses.40: tua lo sungah mangbuh le mangbuhham tangin kiak le ling po tahen,” a ci hi. Jobʼ thugente bei ta hi.
